events.title: Maker Session - Beach Themed Resin Art
events.body: Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This week's Maker's Session is a Beach Themed Resin Art Class hosted by These Two Crafty Chicks. Choose from three different project options: Charcuterie Board ($65), Trinkey Tray ($45) or Lazy Susan ($85)Tickets include all materials needed to create your work of art that you can take home. Wine and food are not incldued in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class. All ages are welcome for this event.

events.title: Fido Friday
events.body:
**Fridays are for Fidoand Flight Specials!**

*Our 4-legged friends are welcome on the patio or green spaces. 15% off wine flights and 15% off "barkuterie" boards from our store for your furry companion.*

events.title: Vino & Vinyasa with The Studio Yoga Instructors
events.body: Get ready to uncork your potential with the Vino & Vinyasa class hosted at the vineyard by instructors from [The Studio @ Mattapoisett Wellness Center](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100094819986187). Whether you're a downward dog pro or a tree pose newbie, this series is all about savoring the sweet serenity of yoga in a vineyard setting. Tickets must be purchased in advance and include a drink voucher to be enjoyed after your class in the vineyard tasting room.

events.title: Live Music: The Racky Thomas Band
events.body:
Live music by the [Racky Thomas Band](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100032430986943) from 4-7. $5 cover charge. 

All ages welcome. Dogs allowed on the patio

events.title: Live Music from 2-5: Chip Allen
events.body: Live Music from 2-5: [Chip Allen](https://www.facebook.com/ChipAllenMusic)

events.title: Fido Friday and Phoenix on the Fly Food Truck
events.body:
**Fridays are for Fido, Food Trucks and Flight Specials!**

*Our 4-legged friends are welcome on the patio or green spaces. 15% off wine flights and 15% off "barkuterie" boards from our store for your furry companion. The food truck will be pumping out delicious eats from 3-8.*

**Today's Food Truck: [Phoenix on the Fly ](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063697864255)from** ***3-8***

events.body: Get ready to uncork your potential with the Vino & Vinyasa class hosted at the vineyard by instructors from [The Studio @ Mattapoisett Wellness Center](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100094819986187). Whether you're a downward dog pro or a tree pose newbie, this series is all about savoring the sweet serenity of yoga in a vineyard setting. events.title: End of Harvest Celebration!
events.body:
Join us in celebrating the close of another harvest season! Grab a photo in our grape stomp vat!

Live Music: [Craig DeMelo](https://www.facebook.com/TheWhiskeyPoet) from 1-4 and [Blues Alley](https://www.facebook.com/BluesAlleyband) from 5-8

$5 cover charge. All ages welcome. Dogs allowed Outside

Local Vendor Market from 1-7. Shop our pop-up local vendor market for unique and hand crafted items!

Food Trucks from 1-7:

[Phoenix on the Fly](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063697864255) 

[Sorbae Frozen Treats](https://www.facebook.com/sorbaefrozentreats)

events.title: Live Music from 2-5: Robert Chandler
events.body: Live Music from 2-5 by [Robert Chandler](https://www.facebook.com/robert.chandler.18847)

events.title: Wine & Seafood Pairing Event!
events.body:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS A 21+ ONLY, RAIN OR SHINE EVENT. DUE TO THE FACT THAT THIS IS A PRE-FIXED MENU, WE ARE NOT ABLE TO ACCOMMODATE ANY DIETARY RESTRICTIONS.

Nasketucket Bay Vineyard brings you the collaboration of [The Little Phoenix ](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063697864255)and Wine Educator Missa Capozzo of Wine Down Events for a guided seafood and wine pairing experience! During this entertaining guided event, you will learn how and why each wine complements each seafood dish, which will be served fresh off the food truck. In addition, you will learn the fundamentals of wine and food pairing with fun, educational demonstrations.\
The Menu:\
1- Mini Lobster Roll\
2 - Fried Clams \
3 - Scallops wrapped in bacon 

4 - Shrimp Mozambique\
5 - Stuffed Quahog

This event will sell out super quickly. Don't hesitate to get your tickets!

***Limited bottle sales will be allowed for this event.***

events.title: Columbus Day Celebration!
events.body:
Join us for our Columbus Day Celebration with live music from 12-4 by [Mike & Adlie](https://www.facebook.com/adlieandmikeacoustic)

Food Truck: [Travelers On Tour](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100085405684555)

$5 cover charge. Supervised children allowed. Dogs allowed outside. No reservations or tickets needed.

events.title: Maker Session: Water Color Painting with Lana Quann
events.body: Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! events.title: Pumpkin Carving & Halloween Costume Contest!
events.body: Enjoy a day with the family at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard. Tickets must be purchased in advance for the pumpkin carving so a pumpkin can be reserved for your child! Parents, come dressed in your best costume and wine a bottle of wine! Prizes will be given for children's costumes as well. Reserve your pumpkins today!

events.title: Maker Session: Fall Painted Pumpkin
events.body: Maker Sessions at Nasketucket Bay Vineyard are an opportunity to let your creative juices flow, every other Thursday night. Learn a new craft, taught by a local artisan while you sip wine and create your very own masterpiece to take home! This week's Maker's Session is a Fall Painted (fake) Pumpkin, hosted by Kathleen Patrick from Create with Kath. Tickets are $35 per person and include all materials needed to create your work of art that you can take home. Wine and food are not incldued in the ticket price. No outside food or drink is allowed. Wine, drink specials and specialty food items are available to purchase in the vineyard farm store to nosh on during your class. All ages are welcome for this event.
